timeline.message: Fix 2 instances of interal rep leak and a possible handle leak

timeline.bodyText: This technically causes an issue where if a modification to actions occurs outside of the ctor this class would no longer see that effect. But i don't think we support that case
timeline.author: res0nance

replies.bodyText: It sounds to me like it would be a bug we need to fix if the situation arises.
replies.author: varyvol

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure it would be a bug here but a "wrong usage" on the other side, no?
replies.author: alecharp

replies.bodyText: It should be a bug but I'm merely making a point of mentioning it.
replies.author: res0nance
